data.lyric:
[ti:The Moment I Knew (Taylor’s Version)]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:Red (Taylor's Version)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Moment I Knew (Taylor’s Version) - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:05.00]Lyrics by：Taylor Swift
[00:10.01]Composed by：Taylor Swift
[00:15.02]You should've been there
[00:16.58]
[00:17.19]Should've burst through the door
[00:19.00]With that "Baby I'm right here" smile
[00:22.19]And it would've felt like
[00:24.22]
[00:24.94]A million little shining stars had just aligned
[00:29.46]And I would've been so happy
[00:32.87]
[00:37.59]Christmas lights glisten
[00:39.87]I've got my eye on the door
[00:42.04]Just waiting for you to walk in
[00:44.86]But the time is ticking
[00:47.81]People ask me how I've been
[00:49.63]As I comb back through my memory
[00:52.29]
[00:52.85]How you said you'd be here
[00:56.87]
[01:00.80]You said you'd be here
[01:05.77]
[01:06.97]And it was like slow motion
[01:11.40]
[01:12.20]Standing there in my party dress
[01:15.25]In red lipstick
[01:18.84]
[01:20.22]With no one to impress
[01:22.89]And they're all laughing
[01:27.05]
[01:27.62]As I'm looking around the room
[01:30.30]But there was one thing missing
[01:34.71]
[01:35.46]And that was the moment I knew
[01:38.39]
[01:53.54]And the hours pass by
[01:56.05]Now I just wanna be alone
[01:58.02]But your close friends always seem to know
[02:00.93]When there's something really wrong
[02:03.28]
[02:03.96]So they follow me down the hall
[02:06.17]
[02:08.83]And there in the bathroom
[02:11.44]I try not to fall apart
[02:13.23]And the sinking feeling starts
[02:15.11]As I say hopelessly
[02:16.87]"He said he'd be here"
[02:21.04]
[02:23.09]And it was like slow motion
[02:27.61]
[02:28.28]Standing there in my party dress
[02:31.39]In red lipstick
[02:35.63]
[02:36.33]With no one to impress
[02:39.02]And they're all laughing
[02:43.03]
[02:43.99]And asking me about you
[02:46.66]But there was one thing missing
[02:49.35]
[02:51.64]And that was the moment I knew
[02:54.03]
[02:55.57]What do you say
[02:57.06]When tears are streaming down your face
[02:58.89]In front of everyone you know
[03:02.41]
[03:03.11]And what do you do
[03:04.61]When the one who means the most to you
[03:07.41]Is the one who didn't show
[03:10.45]
[03:17.95]You should've been here
[03:19.42]
[03:23.96]And I would've been so happy
[03:28.01]
[03:31.63]And it was like slow motion
[03:36.23]
[03:36.88]Standing there in my party dress
[03:39.96]In red lipstick
[03:43.32]
[03:44.98]With no one to impress
[03:47.51]And they're all standing around me singing
[03:51.88]
[03:52.61]"Happy birthday to you"
[03:55.00]But there was one thing missing
[03:58.65]
[04:00.22]And that was the moment I knew
[04:03.36]
[04:04.29]Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh I knew
[04:12.04]Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
[04:17.70]
[04:18.29]You called me later
[04:20.72]And said "I'm sorry I didn't make it"
[04:23.11]And I said "I'm sorry too"
[04:25.18]
[04:25.93]And that was the moment I knew
